body:
Avicus Network Community YouTube Channel


Hello Everyone!

Welcome to the Avicus Network Community Channel Official Thread. The way that it works is that I will be showing off other people's content and doing many other thing on the channel (Avicus Related) and also providing the following either now or in the near future:

  • Intros into Game Modes

  • Tips and tricks to public matches

  • Competitive recordings of scrims

  • Community videos

  • Advertising

  • Tutorials

  • Montages

  • Interviews

  • Avicus Map Overviews (Using YouTube 360)


You guys can go & find the channel here and you can go and subscribe to it as well to be alerted to all uploads on the channel!

You can also apply for Meet The Member here!


Requirements:

The recommended video submission requirements that it has to be 720p quality and can be at least 30-60 FPS (Frames Per Second) we will not accept videos that have like 5-10 to 20 FPS clips...

To submit your videos to the Avicus Community Channel please fill out this form here! (http://goo.gl/forms/DQUzc0tGI7)


Apply for Avicus Community Director Here!
body_tagged:
Avicus Network Community YouTube Channel


Hello Everyone!

Welcome to the Avicus Network Community Channel Official Thread. The way that it works is that I will be showing off other people's content and doing many other thing on the channel (Avicus Related) and also providing the following either now or in the near future:

  • Intros into Game Modes

  • Tips and tricks to public matches

  • Competitive recordings of scrims

  • Community videos

  • Advertising

  • Tutorials

  • Montages

  • Interviews

  • Avicus Map Overviews (Using YouTube 360)


You guys can go & find the channel here and you can go and subscribe to it as well to be alerted to all uploads on the channel!

You can also apply for Meet The Member here!


Requirements:

The recommended video submission requirements that it has to be 720p quality and can be at least 30-60 FPS (Frames Per Second) we will not accept videos that have like 5-10 to 20 FPS clips...

To submit your videos to the Avicus Community Channel please fill out this form here! (http://goo.gl/forms/DQUzc0tGI7)


Apply for Avicus Community Director Here!
title: Community YouTube (RIP Community Channel)

replies.body:
"So the upload schedule is at the moment that I have planned is I will make 1-2 videos for the channel them 2-3 videos will be for you guys to share your content! If you have any problems or think it could work better please contact me!"

It's a community channel, there should be no set upload dates or people who upload. It should be to highlight videos that deserve it, not put videos on there for the sake of it. This is my opinion at least.
replies.body_tagged:
"So the upload schedule is at the moment that I have planned is I will make 1-2 videos for the channel them 2-3 videos will be for you guys to share your content! If you have any problems or think it could work better please contact me!"

It's a community channel, there should be no set upload dates or people who upload. It should be to highlight videos that deserve it, not put videos on there for the sake of it. This is my opinion at least.
